E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1978
Subject: Progress of Rob Picciolo
Dear Sir,
Rob Picciolo has nothing more to prove at A Wisconsin Rapids Twins!
He has an AVG of .336 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1978
Subject: Progress of Joe Pittman
Dear Sir,
Joe Pittman has an AVG of .278 at A Wisconsin Rapids Twins!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1978
Subject: Progress of Jim Clancy
Dear Sir,
Jim Clancy is doing pretty good at AA Orlando Twins!
He has an ERA of 3.83, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
